meta.description: Welcome on my portfolio, I'm Thomas Remblier, a web designer and developer. Here you can find my projects, my experiences and my skills.

job1.title: SCJ Informatique
job1.description: Currently in a work-study program at SCJ Informatique, I am responsible for creating mockups and visual communication materials. I have also had the opportunity to work on development projects.

job2.title: MS Conseil Normandie
job2.description: To complete my first year, I did my internship at MS Conseil Normandie. I worked on the company's graphic redesign and the creation of visuals.

job3.title: E.Leclerc
job3.description: During my internship at MS Conseil Normandie, I had the opportunity to work at the E.Leclerc drive in my town. This was my first professional experience.

projet1.title: Website Mockup Legandary Motors
projet1.informationText: This prototype was created as part of my studies in 2024. Made with Figma, it was designed for a vintage car sales website inspired by the game GTA V.
projet1.descriptionText: Légendary Motors is a company specializing in the sale of luxury vehicles, renowned for its commitment to excellence and elegance. Founded on a passion for exceptional automobiles, Légendary Motors offers an exclusive selection of prestigious cars that combine cutting-edge performance, refined design, and quality craftsmanship. Each vehicle available at Légendary Motors embodies the essence of modern luxury, providing customers with a personalized and highly satisfying purchasing experience.

projet2.title: Website Mockup Diva Pasta
projet2.informationText: This prototype was created as part of my studies in 2024. Made with Figma, it was designed for a tasting italian restaurant  website.
projet2.descriptionText: Diva Pasta is a high-end Italian restaurant, renowned for its elegant ambiance and culinary excellence. Situated in the heart of the city, Diva Pasta provides an unparalleled gastronomic experience where traditional Italian cuisine meets modern innovation. Our menu is a symphony of authentic flavors and contemporary creations, crafted with fresh, top-quality ingredients.

projet3.title: Y Social Platform
projet3.informationText: This prototype was created as part of my studies in 2024. Made with Figma, it was designed for a plant shop website.
projet3.descriptionText: The Green House is a plant shop that offers a wide selection of indoor and outdoor plants, as well as gardening supplies and accessories. Our mission is to provide customers with the tools and knowledge they need to create their own green oasis at home. At The Green House, we believe that plants have the power to transform any space into a peaceful and harmonious environment, and we are dedicated to helping our customers bring nature indoors.
